content.rendered:
Balconies      Gates      Railings      Handrails      Staircases & Balustrades

Balconies
Gates
Railings
Handrails
Staircases & Balustrades

Built-up areas of residency like London and other highly populated cities can benefit from having a balcony installed on their property. A balcony is an asset to any property which allows for a small outdoor haven to enjoy the sunshine. Our Balconies are handcrafted and designed in the UK by skilled Italian metalwork specialists. We believe in quality, for this reason, we only use the finest materials to guarantee the durability of our products.

Big Ferro Creations Showcase gallery

info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857
info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857

You can opt for a contemporary or traditional design that can help maximise the space available at your property. When it comes to creating stunning balconies, safety is, of course, our main priority. Our balconies are reinforced and can be expertly fitted to your property to ensure it serves its longevity and durability. Balconies are also a very popular feature added to many commercial properties and units, allowing a friendly outdoor space for a quick break.

Types of metal balconies include, but are not limited to: hung balconies, Juliet balconies, stainless steel balconies, victorian balconies and more.

Follow Us!
